mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, P.* FROM ( select owner_no, owner_companyname, min(off_season_price) off_season_price, owner_address, owner_category from owner join room using (owner_no) group by owner_no,owner_companyname, owner_address, owner_category ) P ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{startList} +1 AND #{listSize} + #{startList}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, P.* FROM ( select owner_no, owner_companyname, min(off_season_price) off_season_price, owner_address, owner_category from owner join room using (owner_no) group by owner_no,owner_companyname, owner_address, owner_category having OWNER_COMPANYNAME like '%'||#{search}||'%' or OWNER_ADDRESS like '%'||#{search}||'%' ) P ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{startList} +1 AND #{listSize} + #{startList}

SELECT count(1) FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, P.* FROM ( select owner_no, owner_companyname, min(off_season_price) off_season_price, owner_address, owner_category from owner join room using (owner_no) group by owner_no,owner_companyname, owner_address, owner_category having OWNER_COMPANYNAME like '%'||#{search}||'%' or OWNER_ADDRESS like '%'||#{search}||'%' ) P )
